info.title: Vantage KYC API
info.description: Vantage KYC Case Management API - Ardonagh Specialities

schema.title: Response Create Case Endpoint Api Cases Post

get.description:
Get all cases with pagination, filtering and sorting.

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (0-indexed, default: 0)
- pageSize: Number of items per page (default: 25)
- sortBy: Field to sort by (default: createdAt)
- sortOrder: Sort order - 'asc' or 'desc' (default: desc)
- view: Preset view filter - 'my-cases', 'all-cases', or 'sla-breaches'
- search: Free-text search on entity name or case ID
- case_status: Filter by case status
- businessUnit: Filter by business unit
- assignedUser: Filter by assigned user

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search entity name or case ID

parameters.description: Search entity name or case ID

schema.title: Response Update Case Endpoint Api Cases  Case Id  Put
Response Delete Case Endpoint Api Cases  Case Id  Delete

post.description:
Convert a case to PAS Client Process format.

This endpoint retrieves a case and converts it to the downstream
PAS (Process Automation System) schema format.

Convert a case to PAS format and send to downstream processing queue.

This endpoint:
1. Retrieves the case
2. Converts it to PAS Client Process format
3. Sends it to the processing queue for downstream automation

The case will be added to the queue with the specified priority.
